OrgName.entry: HACKENTHORPE AND BIRLEY TENANTS AND COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION

AltName.entry: HACKENTHORPE TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Actively represents the interests of local tenants and residents and takes up issues on their behalf. Also looking to bring events into the TARA area which will benefit all the community.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Barbara Stapleton, Chairperson/Mr Barry Stapleton, Secretary
